text: @realDonaldTrump @senatemajldr Really, that’s what you are worried about?  You are such a POS!  You have millions of Americans suffering from Covid-19 and unemployment and you are worried about judges getting put in place for your failing election.  So if you don’t win you can cry voter fraud. POS
